title.rendered: Financial Commission Announces Binomo as Latest Approved Member

content.rendered:
June 11th, 2018, The Financial Commission, a leading independent member-driven external dispute resolution (EDR) organization for international online brokerages that participate in global foreign exchange (forex), derivatives, and CFD markets, today announces Binomo as its newest approved Member.

Binomo status as an A-category Member of the Financial Commission took effect on May 16, 2018, following the approval of its membership application by Financial Commission, thus allowing the company and its customers access to a wide range of services and membership benefits including, but not limited to, protection for up to €20,000 per submitted complaint, backed by the Financial Commission’s compensation fund.

Financial Commission provides brokerages and their customers with an unbiased 3rd party mediation platform that helps resolve complaints in instances when parties are unable to directly come to an agreement over disputes.

For approved members and their clients participating in CFDs, foreign exchange (forex) and cryptocurrency markets, Financial Commission helps facilitate a simpler, swifter resolution process than through typical regulatory channels such as arbitration or local court systems.

Binomo joins a diverse range of brokerages and independent services providers (ISPs) that utilise the services of the Financial Commission and as part of their commitment to their clients while upholding membership requirements.

About Binomo

Binomo is a convenient and simple platform for trading the most popular assets such as, currencies (FOREX), cryptocurrencies, stocks, and commodities. The company made trading to be affordable to every category of traders thanks to very low minimum deposit and deal sizes.

For those who are just starting their path in trading or those who want to improve their skills, Binomo offers a free demo account with unlimited virtual funds and a flexible education system.

Binomo traders can use the following advantages of the platform:

  • Traders can instantly credit your account balance and withdraw the funds they’ve earned within 24 hours.
  • Binomo qualified support service will answer any question via the communication channel of trader’s choice (Skype, email, phone, chat).
  • Free training is available on the platform: video lessons, trading strategies, and an extensive knowledge base.
  • Traders with the VIP and Gold status are provided with a personal manager.
  • Various types of incentives, special offers and tournaments are available.

For more information please contact Binomo directly.

About Financial Commission

Financial Commission is an independent external dispute resolution (EDR) organization for consumers/traders who are unable to resolve disputes directly with their financial services providers that are members of the Financial Commission. Financial Commission initially set out to provide a new approach for traders and brokers alike to resolve any issues that arise in the course of trading electronic markets such Foreign Exchange, and then expanded into CFDs and related derivatives, in addition to certifying technology platforms used for trading.

For more information please contact us at info@financialcommission.org.
